page.title: 08Ladock Post Office and Shop
page.content: Mr and Mrs Palmer own the Post Office and shop.They have been here for one year and ten months.They came here because they liked the look of it. The shop has been here for ten years but the Post Office only three.It used to be situated in the Square.They get up at 6.00 am so that they can get to the Shop at 8.00 pm.The Post Office is open from 9.00 am to 12.30 pm and 1.30 pm to 5.30pm on week days.On Wednesdays and Saturdays it opens from 9.00 am to 12.30 pm.There are two employees who work in the shop.The stores for the shop come in every single day of the week.The shop closes at5.30 pm but they leave at 8.30 pm.If they are away their employees look after the Shop and Post Office.They are quite busy especially on bread days.Mr and Mrs Palmer love working here because they like meeting people.
